title: ennavenru shollavE
sahitya:
ennavenru shollavE iyalavillai ennAlE vanna mayil vAhanA unnarumai perumaiyai nAn


anupallavi

  pannaga shayananum ponnambalattaiyanum unran mahimai kaNDu uLLakkaLi koNDadai


caraNam    dEvar tam tuyar tIra mAdhavam purinda pOdu bhUvulagattOrkkum yAvarkkum eppOdum
kAvalanAi mEvina sEvark-koDiyOn unnai sEvippOrin pAvam tIra aruL purivOnE
